name: delaPlex Sofware
tag_list: delaplex, software, atlanta, company, outsourced, development, it, outsourcing, nagpur, georgia
overview:
delaPlex Software is a US-based company that specializes in outsourced software engineering and project management.

delaPlex has substantial experience and specializes in ASP.Net , C#, VB.NET, VC++, .NET 1.1, .NET 2.0, .NET 3.5, .NET 4.0, XML, SQL, WPF, WCF, MVC, LINQ, AJAX, Webservices, JAVA, J2EE, JSP, Struts, Hibernate, JSF, EJB, Liferay, HTML, CSS, PHP, OSCommerce, Magento development.

delaPlex has exclusive mobile application development division which specializes in iPhone, J2ME, BlackBerry, Android development. We have helped lots of companies in successfully developing innovative software solutions over past several years.

delaPlex undertakes every aspect of the project execution: requirements management, product design and architecture, programming and development, quality assurance, documentation preparation, tech support, and software maintenance by making use of proven Agile development process models.
